tool_description: An API showing the latest news about climate change
name: Newsfeed for climate change
title: Newsfeed for climate change

api_list.name: Get Individual Source News
api_list.description: This endpoint gets news about climate change from a specific news resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://newsfeed-for-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "newsfeed-for-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://newsfeed-for-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "newsfeed-for-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all recent news about climate change
api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
